q_ch: 分配给Precision Cutters的裁剪任务有哪些？
q_en: What are the cutting tasks assigned to Precision Cutters?
gt:
Hello there! 😄 Let's take a look at the cutting tasks assigned to the "Precision Cutters" working group. Here's what I found:

| Task ID | Start Time       | End Time         | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status | Order Name                  | Product Attributes | Product Description |
|---------|------------------|------------------|----------------|------------------|--------|-----------------------------|--------------------|---------------------|
| 18      | March 11, 2024   | April 7, 2024    | 200            | 200              | Completed | James_WinterOrder           | Brown, L size      | Jacket              |
| 30      | April 19, 2024   | April 26, 2024   | 195            | 195              | Completed | William_Skirt_Sweater_Shorts | Red, L size        | Shorts              |

It looks like the "Precision Cutters" have been busy with some exciting tasks! If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask! 😊

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Precision Cutters';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group with the name "Precision Cutters"

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, ct.planned_number, ct.completed_number, ct.status, op.id AS order_product_id, o.order_name, p.attributes, pt.description FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN order_product op ON ct.order_product_id = op.id JOIN orders o ON op.order_id = o.id JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE ct.working_group_id = '1';
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting tasks assigned to the working group "Precision Cutters"
